feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas to separate clauses and list items. Both texts have clear sentence boundaries with appropriate punctuation.

feature2.explanation: Both texts use formal language and exhibit a similar level of lexical variation. Grammatical categories and part of speech usage are consistent across both texts.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are well-formed and exhibit similar complexity. Both texts maintain coherence and cohesion in presenting ideas.

feature4.explanation: While the tone and mood differ between the texts, common expressions and idioms are not prominent in either. Narrative styles and speech events show some similarity in formality.

feature5.explanation: Both texts are free from spelling and typographical errors, indicating a similar level of attention to detail in writing.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, and absence of spelling errors, it is moderately likely that the two texts were written by the same author.
